doc.title: A Kentucky Feud
doc.plot: When Jim Hatfield beats Buddy McCoy for stealing some apples, it begins a bitter feud between their two families. Soon afterwards, at an auction, Buddy takes a shot at Jim, and accidentally kills Jim's mother. Sally McCoy and Jim are in love with each other, further complicating the situation. As feelings become inflamed on both sides, a full-scale blood feud erupts.
